Black.en: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.
Black.de: Anwender greift an, indem er das Ziel in wunderschöne, intensiv blaue Flammen hüllt, die es eventuell verbrennen.
